Flow.description: Creates manual share record on Cases submitted by Internal Beam Suntory to enable proper access to Case post-submission; flow will also populate the case with a link to the Submitter for reporting.

value.stringValue: AND( ISNEW(), ISBLANK( [Case].ContactId ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( [Case].Origin, "Email" )), NOT( ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, "Closed - Abandoned")), OR( [Case].RecordType.Name = "RTR", [Case].RecordType.Name = "OTC Billing", CONTAINS([Case].RecordType.Name, "OTC - "), [Case].RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP", [Case].RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP - PR/PO", [Case].RecordType.Name = "HR", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Payroll", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Inquiry", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Order Claim", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Changes", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Orders", [Case].RecordType.Name = "EDI Order", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Inquiry (Internal)", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Escalated Form", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Account Change/Extend", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Center Account Create", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Center Change", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Customer Hierarchy", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Customer Maintenance", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - EDW Mapping", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Materials", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Rebates", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Simple Request", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Vendor Maintenance", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM", [Case].RecordType.Name = "T&E", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Quote Request", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Compliance Inquiry", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Tax", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Claims" ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: AND( ISNEW(), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.ContactId} ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Origin}, "Email" )), NOT( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, "Closed - Abandoned")), OR( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "RTR", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "OTC Billing", CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}, "OTC - "), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PTP/AP", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PTP/AP - PR/PO", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "HR", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Payroll", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Inquiry", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Order Claim", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Changes", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Orders", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "EDI Order", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Inquiry (Internal)", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Escalated Form", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Account Change/Extend", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Center Account Create", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Center Change", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Customer Hierarchy", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Customer Maintenance", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - EDW Mapping", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Materials", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Rebates", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Simple Request", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Vendor Maintenance", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "T&E", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Quote Request", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Compliance Inquiry", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Tax", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Claims" ) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISNEW(), ISBLANK( [Case].ContactId ), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Origin, "Email" ), NOT( ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, "Closed - Abandoned")), OR( [Case].RecordType.Name = "RTR", [Case].RecordType.Name = "OTC Billing", CONTAINS([Case].RecordType.Name, "OTC - "), [Case].RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP", [Case].RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP - PR/PO", [Case].RecordType.Name = "HR", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Payroll", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Inquiry", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Order Claim", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Quality Claim", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Changes", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Orders", [Case].RecordType.Name = "EDI Order", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Inquiry (Internal)", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Escalated Form", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Account Change/Extend", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Center Account Create", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Center Change", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Customer Hierarchy", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Customer Maintenance", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - EDW Mapping", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Materials", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Rebates", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Simple Request", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM - Vendor Maintenance", [Case].RecordType.Name = "GMDM", [Case].RecordType.Name = "T&E", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Quote Request", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Compliance Inquiry", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Tax", [Case].RecordType.Name = "Claims" ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND( ISNEW(), ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.ContactId} ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Origin}, "Email" ), NOT( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, "Closed - Abandoned")), OR( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "RTR", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "OTC Billing", CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}, "OTC - "), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PTP/AP", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "PTP/AP - PR/PO", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "HR", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Payroll", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Inquiry", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Order Claim", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Quality Claim", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Changes", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Orders", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "EDI Order", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Inquiry (Internal)", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Escalated Form", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Account Change/Extend", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Center Account Create", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Center Change", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Customer Hierarchy", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Customer Maintenance", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - EDW Mapping", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Materials", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Rebates", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Simple Request", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM - Vendor Maintenance", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "GMDM", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "T&E", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Quote Request", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Compliance Inquiry", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Tax", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = "Claims" ) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED( [Case].OwnerId ), NOT(ISBLANK([Case].Submitter__c)), NOT( ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, "Closed - Abandoned")), [Case].Submitter__c.IsActive = TRUE )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.OwnerId} ), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Submitter__c})), NOT( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, "Closed - Abandoned")), {!myVariable_current.Submitter__r.IsActive} = TRUE )

value.stringValue: AND( ISNEW(), NOT( ISPICKVAL( [Case].Origin, "Email" )), NOT( ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, "Closed - Abandoned")), [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = "Quality_Claim" )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: AND( ISNEW(), NOT( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Origin}, "Email" )), NOT( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, "Closed - Abandoned")), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = "Quality_Claim" )

Flow.label: Share Cases
